trends: There has been one other sighting in Georgetown Township
There were no other sightings in Georgetown Township on or around October 27th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI came home & stopped in the driveway & got out of the car & retrieved the newspaper from the box. I got back in the car and started pulling toward the garage when I looked up into the sky toward the north and noticed several orange globes of light mostly in a staight line moving from north to southwest. I shut off the car and got out to observe better. I walked out of the light of the garage into the darker area west of the garage and noticed more lights appearing from the north. There were about 4 that seemed bunched up and then they aligned into a straight line and moved toward the west where, one by one, they just disappeared. In all there were about 10. There was no sound to them. I could hear the announcer at the high school football field, but there was no other sound. I observed that there was no wind and the moon was slightly obscured by clouds to the south & east of the driveway. I ran to the door of the house and called to my husband, but he did not hear me as he was in the basement and I did not want to lose sight of the globes so I did not go & get him. It took about 5 minutes for this to finish. There was no mention on the 11:00 pm news and no reports on the internet. I regret that I did not have my camera, as my husband, mother and brother do not believe me. Can you please tell me what they were?
Summary: 10 orange globes of light flying from north to west with no sound & then disappearing.
